title: 437 61st ST, 1/2 block to Rockridge Bart. Wood flooring. Garden.
posting_body: This beautiful house is 0.6 miles to Rockridge Bart.
3 blocks to Claremont Ave and College Ave, full of coffee shops, cafes,restaurants and grocery store.
Upper level has Hardwood floors that have been refinished.
Living room with decorative fireplace.
dining room with refurbished original built ins.
Kitchen with stainless steel appliances.
Double door fridge, Gas stove with oven and Dishwasher.
Upper level has 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom.
Lower level accessed by exiting the kitchen door and walking to the back of the house and entering the back door.
Bedroom/bonus room with attached bathroom.
Laundry room with washer and dryer.
Downstairs bathroom is shower only.
Access to garage and storage area from the bedroom/bonus room.
Garden has a wooden patio is low maintenance garden.
Sorry no pets and no smoking.
Available now, Deposit 2 times the rent.
A.S.K. Rentals
a: 1700, Solano Ave, Suite B. Berkeley CA 94707
Office hours: Monday through Friday 9am to 5pm.
Saturday 9am to 1:30pm.
Sunday we are closed.
